claims.claim: Criminal records should not hinder personal and professional progress.
claims.quote: Just because I, I got an F behind my name. I try not to make that hinder me...

claims.claim: Expungement laws are inadequate for helping all deserving individuals.
claims.quote: I helped Safe & Just write the expungement law and I went through the, through the motions and I can't get it expunged...

claims.claim: Self-employment can be a viable option for individuals with criminal records.
claims.quote: I'm not trying to rent any place. So I'm good and I work for myself

claims.claim: Individual adaptation and resilience are crucial for overcoming barriers associated with a criminal record.
claims.quote: I'm okay with it because it's not holding me back from doing anything I'm trying to do.
